actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, with respect to the appointment of representatives of United States flag liner carriers to the delegation of the United States Government to any international conference or meeting affecting liner ocean shipping.

summary.text: Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to authorize the Federal Maritime Commission to appoint representatives of United States flag line carriers to the delegation of the United States to any international conference or meeting affecting liner ocean shipping.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, with respect to the appointment of representatives of United States flag liner carriers to the delegation of the United States Government to any international conference or meeting affecting liner ocean shipping.
